item.title: Portfolio
item.description: PROJECTS: Scalable 2-Tier Web Application w/ Kubernetes, Docker, & MongoDB Github 3-Tier Web Application Deployment – Terraform + AWS Github DevOps Lab: VM Environment with NGINX Monitoring Stack Github Kubernetes Cluster Setup – “The Hard Way” on Vagrant Github
